REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2475 reute r f BC-INTERFACE-FLOORING-SY 04-07 0056

TEXT.TITLE: INTERFACE FLOORING SYSTEMS <IFSIA> IN OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Interface Flooring Systems Inc said it announced a public offering of 2,800,000 shares of the company's Class A common stock at a price of 21.25 dlrs per share. The underwriting group was co-managed by the Robinson-Humphry Co Inc, and PaineWebber Inc, it said. Reuter
